description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Salad with Seafood Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn salad,Low saturated fat,Prawn,Tree nut free,Low sugar,High fibre,Avocado,Asparagus,Low fat,Easter,Dairy free
name: Prawn Salad with Seafood Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 shallots, trimmed and sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: Wash watercress well in cold water, snip off sprigs and pat dry with a paper towel.
Cut asparagus into 3cm lengths and drop into boiling water for 1 to 2 minutes until tender. Drain, and refresh in cold water then drain again.
Arrange watercress sprigs, asparagus, avocado, shallots and prawns into serving bowls.
Place seafood cocktail sauce in a small bowl for dipping.
Serve with a slice of crusty wholegrain bread.
